pr_title: Don't conflict URI if an endpoint prefix is present

timeline.message: Don't conflict URI if an endpoint prefix is present

timeline.bodyText: Can we just return a map and state that the map maintains order?
timeline.author: mtdowling

replies.bodyText: Yes, but this was an exiting method from UriPattern so it's gonna get ugly. Pushed the change in a separate commit, enjoy
replies.author: JordonPhillips

timeline.bodyText: Personal nit: I'd replace this with good old-fashioned looking Java. Maybe it's because the indentation implies that the Optional composition doesn't wrap the streaming composition.
timeline.author: mtdowling

timeline.message: Pull optional handling apart from input handling
